docs.snippet: A Massachusetts county sheriff has proposed sending prison inmates from around the United States to build the proposed wall along the Mexican border that is one of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's most prominent campaign promises....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts county sheriff has proposed sending prison inmates from around the United States to build the proposed wall along the Mexican border that is one of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's most prominent campaign promises.

headline.main: Massachusetts Sheriff Offers Prison Inmates to Build Trump's Wall
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Sheriff Offers Prison Inmates to Build Trump's Wall

docs.snippet: Two senior Turkish military officers were jailed for life on Thursday for involvement in July's failed coup attempt that killed almost 250 people, marking the first conviction related to the putsch, news agencies said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two senior Turkish military officers were jailed for life on Thursday for involvement in July's failed coup attempt that killed almost 250 people, marking the first conviction related to the putsch, news agencies said.

headline.main: Turkey Jails Two Commanders for Life in First Ruling Over Coup Attempt

docs.snippet: Brazil's President Michel Temer said on Thursday there was confusion about the role government forces should have played during the riot at a privately run prison this week that ended with 56 inmates killed by fellow prisoners....

docs.snippet: Bank of England Chief Economist Andy Haldane said on Thursday that the central bank was right to keep an eye on a strong increase in consumer lending but that there were reasons to believe that the pickup was not a major problem....
